Nerangs.ab: fradaϑāi ahurahe mazdāi raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō daste čahār angušt bālā bordan yaʾni bozorg dāram ormazd riyōmand ḫorremand rā fradaϑāi aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm čahār angušt digar daste bālā bordan yaʾni bozorg dāram amešāsfandān rā fradaϑāi tištriiehe stārō raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō čahār angušt digar daste bālātar bar dãštan yaʾni bozorg dāram tištar setar-e ormazd-dād fradaϑāi narš aṣ̌aonō cahār angušt digar daste-ye hāvan bālā dāštan yaʾni bozorg dāram nar ašu rā fradaϑāi vīspanam spəṇtahe mainiiə̄uš dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm daste-ye hāvan čahār angušt digar bālātar dāštan yaʾni bozorg dāram amešāsfandān hamā-ye minuvān va hamā-ye ašuvān pas daste forud āvardan se bār ruy-e hāvan gardānidan mes̱l ke xoršid mi-gardad

"At fradaϑāi ahurahe mazdāi raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō he should lift the pestle four fingers that means, I hold big Urmazd, the rich and glorious. At fradaϑāi aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm he should lift the pestle further four fingers that means, I hold big the Amašasfandān. At fradaϑāi tištriiehe stārō raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō he should lift the pestle further four fingers that means, I hold big the Amašasfandān. At fradaϑāi tištriiehe stārō raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō he should lift the pestle further four fingers that means, I hold big Tištar, the star created by Urmazd. At fradaϑāi narš aṣ̌aonō he should lift the pestle further four fingers that means, I hold big the righteous man. At fradaϑāi vīspanam spəṇtahe mainiiə̄uš dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm he should lift the pestle of the hāvan further four finger that means, I hold big the Amašasfandān, all the spirtiual ones and all the righteous ones. Then he should put down the pestle and rotate it over the rim of the hāvan in the same direction in which the sun rotates."
